metadata.title: USN-3432-1 -- ca-certificates update
metadata.description: The ca-certificates package contained outdated CA certificates. This update refreshes the included certificates to those contained in the 20170717 package.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3432-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ca-certificates - 20170717~14.04.1 No subscription required
